promptText: Create a PowerShell script that automates the provisioning of new SharePoint sites based on a template.
Generate a Power Automate flow that sends an approval request when a new item is added to a SharePoint list.
Design a Power BI dashboard that visualizes monthly sales data with interactive filters for regions and products.
Develop a PowerShell script to bulk update metadata for documents in a SharePoint library.
Create a test plan for a Power Automate flow that sends notifications when a SharePoint file is modified.
Set up an automated schedule for data refresh in a Power BI report connected to SQL Server.
Generate a PowerShell script to audit user permissions across all SharePoint sites.
Write a PowerShell script to identify and remove unused files in users' OneDrive accounts older than one year.
Generate a Power Automate flow that extracts data from incoming invoices and updates a SharePoint list.

promptTitle: Power BI Report Sharing Best Practices
promptText: Create documentation outlining best practices for sharing Power BI reports within the organization.
Develop a project plan for migrating on-premises SharePoint sites to SharePoint Online.

promptTitle: PowerShell Script for User Account Creation
promptText: Create a PowerShell script that automates the creation of new user accounts in Active Directory and assigns them to groups.
Optimize this Power BI report for faster loading times and better performance.
Design a set of branding guidelines for SharePoint sites to ensure a consistent look and feel across the organization.
Implement error handling in a Power Automate flow to retry failed actions and notify administrators.
Develop a PowerShell script to back up SharePoint site collections on a scheduled basis.
Generate training materials for new users to learn how to create basic reports in Power BI.
Draft a governance policy for SharePoint Online usage, including site creation, content management, and user permissions.
Create a Power Automate flow that posts a message in Microsoft Teams when a new item is added to a SharePoint list.
Write a PowerShell script to generate a report on Office 365 license usage across the organization.
Generate a sprint task list for the next two weeks of development on a React project.
Create a project roadmap for the next 3 months, outlining key milestones for a web application launch.
Generate a daily stand-up report based on yesterday’s progress, today’s tasks, and blockers.

promptTitle: GitHub Actions Workflow for AWS Deployment
promptText: Generate a GitHub Actions workflow file to automate deployment of this Node.js application to AWS.
Create a Dockerfile for a full-stack MERN (MongoDB, Express, React, Node) application.
Suggest steps to optimize the CI/CD pipeline for faster deployment and error catching.
Generate a list of security best practices for developing a web application with OAuth2 for authentication.
Suggest code changes to implement CSRF (Cross-Site Request Forgery) protection in this web app.
Analyze this codebase for potential SQL injection vulnerabilities.
Generate documentation for setting up a development environment for this React project.
Create a user guide for the admin dashboard of a web app, covering account creation, data import, and reporting.
Summarize the key points from this code review discussion.
Generate a MongoDB schema for managing a blog with users, posts, and comments.
Write a SQL query to fetch users who haven't logged in within the last 30 days.
Generate database migration scripts to update the schema from version 1.0 to 1.1.
Generate a script that automates the deployment of static assets to a CDN.
Create a cron job script to automatically back up the database every 24 hours.

promptTitle: Repository Update and Server Restart Script
promptText: Generate a script that pulls the latest changes from the repository and restarts the web server.
